verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> came to all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> beside <S%H72>Eben-ezer<s%>: and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H663>Aphek<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> put themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and when they <S%H5203>joined<s%> <S%H4421>battle<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and they <S%H5221>slew<s%> of the <S%H4634>army<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> about <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

¶ And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>smitten<s%> us to <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? Let us <S%H3947>fetch<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> unto us, that, when it <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us, it may <S%H3467>save<s%> us out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of our <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, that they might <S%H5375>bring<s%> from thence the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>: and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%>, <S%H2652>Hophni<s%> and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, were there with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And when the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout<s%>, so that the <S%H776>earth<s%> rang <S%H1949>again<s%>.

And when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8643>shout<s%>, they <S%H559>said<s%>, What meaneth the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>? And they <S%H3045>understood<s%> that the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, for they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>. And they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H188>Woe<s%> unto us! for there hath not been such a thing <S%H865%H8032>heretofore<s%>.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> unto us! who shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of these <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H430>Gods<s%>? these are the <S%H430>Gods<s%> that <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> with all the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and <S%H1961>quit<s%> yourselves like <S%H582>men<s%>, O ye <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, that ye be not <S%H5647>servants<s%> unto the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>, as they have <S%H5647>been<s%> to you: <S%H1961>quit<s%> yourselves like <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H5062>smitten<s%>, and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> into his <S%H168>tent<s%>: and there was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>; for there <S%H5307>fell<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen<s%>.

And the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%>; and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%>, <S%H2652>Hophni<s%> and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, were <S%H4191>slain<s%>.

¶ And there <S%H7323>ran<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> out of the <S%H4634>army<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> with his <S%H4055>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and with <S%H127>earth<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%>, lo, <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> upon a <S%H3678>seat<s%> by the <S%H1870%H3027%H3197>wayside<s%> <S%H6822>watching<s%>: for his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2730>trembled<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. And when the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> it, all the <S%H5892>city<s%> cried <S%H2199>out<s%>.

And when <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6818>crying<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, What meaneth the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of this <S%H1995>tumult<s%>? And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H4116>hastily<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H5941>Eli<s%>.

Now <S%H5941>Eli<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>; and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H6965>dim<s%>, that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5941>Eli<s%>, I am he that <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H4634>army<s%>, and I <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> out of the <S%H4634>army<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What is there <S%H1697>done<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>?

And the <S%H1319>messenger<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and there hath been also a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4046>slaughter<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> also, <S%H2652>Hophni<s%> and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, are <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%>.

And it came to pass, when he made <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, that he <S%H5307>fell<s%> from off the <S%H3678>seat<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%> <S%H1157>by<s%> the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and his <S%H4665>neck<s%> <S%H7665>brake<s%>, and he <S%H4191>died<s%>: for he was an <S%H2204>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and <S%H3513>heavy<s%>. And he had <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

¶ And his daughter in <S%H3618>law<s%>, <S%H6372>Phinehas'<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, was with <S%H2030>child<s%>, near to be <S%H3205>delivered<s%>: and when she <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8052>tidings<s%> <S%H413>that<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%>, and that her father in <S%H2524>law<s%> and her <S%H376>husband<s%> were <S%H4191>dead<s%>, she <S%H3766>bowed<s%> herself and <S%H3205>travailed<s%>; for her <S%H6735>pains<s%> <S%H2015>came<s%> upon her.

And about the <S%H6256>time<s%> of her <S%H4191>death<s%> the women that <S%H5324>stood<s%> by her <S%H1696>said<s%> unto her, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not; for thou hast <S%H3205>born<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>. But she <S%H6030>answered<s%> not, neither did she <S%H7896%H3820>regard<s%> it.

And she <S%H7121>named<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H350>I-chabod<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H1540>departed<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H413>because<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%>, and because of her father in <S%H2524>law<s%> and her <S%H376>husband<s%>.
And she <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H1540>departed<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%>.
